paper_abstract: The objective of this paper is to find an adaptive control strategy which would enable us to estimate the parameters of the ARMAX model as accurately as possible, along with consuming less controlling energy, while keeping the output of the system below a specified level of variability. Using the self-tuning tracker, this paper establishes global convergence of a stochastic adaptive control algorithm for discrete linear system, and the adaptive controller may converge to the one-step-ahead optimal controller at the same time.
paper_title: Optimal adaptive controller for multidimensional ARMAX model
